problems.title: Brushes Not Turning
problems.description: The scrubbing brushes at the bottom aren't moving.
solution_steps: Unscrew the side plate to access the belt.
Replace the rubber belt if snapped.

problems.title: Not Spraying Water
problems.description: Trigger pressed but carpet stays dry.
solution_steps: Use the nozzle clean-out tool to unclog the spray tips.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the issue on a ProHeat 2X Revolution Pet Pro (1986)?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement part typically costs significantly less than a new $523 vacuum, and extending the life of your Bissell is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my ProHeat 2X Revolution Pet Pro (1986) needs a new part?
faqs.answer: Common signs include intermittent power and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the part on my ProHeat 2X Revolution Pet Pro (1986) myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
